lenders.name: Edmund Paul
lenders.loan_because: I need money to have my own buy & sell store in our local town & build online store as well for wider market. Please help since this is the only way I can feed my family. Reassured payment of loan will either be on or before deadlines.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a freelancer of almost anything... from buying & selling variety goods through fee-based services using my computer skills. Bad thing is that not every week I can sell & have clients to feed my family.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I would like to be part of improving something.
lenders.occupational_info: Help people with computers and computers with people.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: It's a personal way to help folks who are striving to improve their lives... and a rising tide lifts all boats.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the written word, creating stories, books, film scripts.

lenders.name: DONOVAN
lenders.loan_because: I loan to buy land in for residential development.Huge profits can be expected.
lenders.occupational_info: Providing decent living conditions at affordable prices.

lenders.name: Kala Philo
lenders.occupation: video and digital content producer, social business fan
lenders.loan_because: I like to see entrepreneurs succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I invite you to connect on Facebook or LinkedIN to learn more about me.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: I want a better world for my children to grow up in.

lenders.name: Tachien
lenders.loan_because: I would like to open a Jamaican Jerk Hut/Drive through in my city. I plan to make it a unique cultural hangout along with great food/flavour experience.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a Jamaican who worked in the restaurant industry as as management for over 10 years. I moved to the UK  in 2010 with my children and worked at TGI Fridays for less than a year and decided to return to higher eduction. I am currently in my final year of university, however my passion is still owning a restaurant and making people happy through good food and undiluted culture.
I was introduced to Kiva since 2006 and now believe that we will be able to make these dreams a reality.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I want to assist women in developing countries to gain dignity by starting their own businesses and thereby contributing to their families and wider community.
lenders.occupational_info: In my previous work I helped children/teens in the public school system. Now I support social justice by contributing to Kiva, writing a blog, singing in a chorus devoted to world/social justice music, writing letters to my Congressman and speaking out against injustice.

lenders.name: Cherish
lenders.loan_because: I want my clients' investments to have a positive impact on the world albeit indirectly. Every piece of land they buy helps one entrepreneur lift themselves up from poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people double their investments in a 4 to 6 year period by investing in developing lands within the city limits.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I want to impact change in the world, and help others help themselves out of extreme poverty.

lenders.name: The Galitas
lenders.loan_because: what Kiva is doing is wonderful. I am sure that many of the recipients & businesses that  Kiva works with would not normally  be able to get these loans.   God has blessed  our family with so much and we want to give back.

lenders.name: bernie
lenders.loan_because: it's better than donating one time. i can help a lot of people. they get a "hand up" not a "hand out"

lenders.name: Paul & Chris
lenders.loan_because: It can make a difference

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are ready to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people and organizations learn how to teach and learn using computers.

lenders.name: Daniel

I loan because I know there are people who are willing to work hard for their families and their communities and they just need help getting started.  I loan because I believe in Christ's message of grace, not just the grace of the Father but of social grace and justice.
lenders.occupational_info: I help and encourage teenagers and their families to trust in Jesus Christ, to care for the world, and to honor God with their lives.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: $25 probably means a lot more to the person who is receiving the loan than it does to me.

lenders.occupational_info: I work in the information technology field. I also enjoy writing and creating art for comics to entertain children and adults alike.

lenders.loan_because: I believe.

lenders.name: Daisy and Steven

With my tiny loan, I'm trying to be that help and I'm confident that a lot of tiny helps will add up to one BIG HELP for the people of Africa.

My parents worked as docters against lepracy, at the Bayara General Hospital in Bauchi. Because I have good memories to that time and know where my roots are from I wish to do a good thing for those who need the extra support. There for I signed up at Kiva.org
lenders.occupational_info: I have my own business in carpentry and wish to help an other carpenter or farmer in central Nigeria.
